statements: DELETE FROM traffic_violations WHERE id = 1;
DELETE FROM traffic_violations WHERE violation_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM traffic_violations WHERE violation_type = 'Speeding' AND location LIKE '%highway%';
DELETE FROM traffic_violations WHERE fine_amount > 500 AND violation_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM traffic_violations WHERE violation_id = 1;
DELETE FROM parking_violations WHERE vehicle_plate_number = 'ABC123';
DELETE FROM traffic_violations WHERE violation_type = 'Speeding' AND driver_license = 'ABC12345';
DELETE FROM parking_violations WHERE violation_date < '2022-01-01' AND fine_amount > 100.00;
DELETE FROM traffic_cameras WHERE location = 'Main Street';
DELETE FROM parking_violations WHERE violation_type = 'Red Zone Parking';
DELETE FROM speeding_tickets WHERE vehicle_number = 'ABC123' AND location = 'Highway A';
DELETE FROM parking_violations WHERE violation_type = 'Parking in No Parking Zone' AND fine_amount = 50.00;
DELETE FROM speeding_tickets WHERE ticket_id = 101;
DELETE FROM parking_tickets WHERE violation_location = 'Main Street';
DELETE FROM speeding_tickets WHERE ticket_id = 100;
DELETE FROM parking_tickets WHERE vehicle_id = 200 AND violation_date < '2021-10-15';
DELETE FROM SpeedingTickets WHERE ticket_id = 1001;
DELETE FROM ParkingViolations WHERE fine_amount > 50.00;
DELETE FROM ParkingViolations WHERE violation_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Drivers WHERE driver_id IN (SELECT driver_id FROM SpeedingTickets WHERE fine_amount > 500);
